column5: Iv'e been wanting to try the ''Sabiki Rig" Glen gave me at Lakair and today was the day...Boy do the rockbass ever like it !!!  I hope Herb approves as it seems that is all the fish gods were providing with one exception...I switched to a tube jig and caught a very lucky smallmouth...any bigger than it was it would have been kept for cleaning...  Herb never kept bass so I dedicated the smallie to Lew's brother EddyK...  Then the rains came...end of story.
Rain???  what rain???   I would say rock bass count, Nice gesture for EddyK as well.  Beats working in the city all day....  Maureen
Yeah,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,what rain,please send to Barrie,Please.  Well done Norm.
Please Send ALL rain into the Grand River
We got that rain down here in Peterborough. Was a nice change from the last few days. Congrats on the fish Beans.

WTG Beans....  As other's asked... WHAT RAIN???? Please send to Innisfil area too.... can't have a bonefire until we get some...  We were all over, boat shopping today, lots of wind, but no sign of rain....
Very nice dedication to Herb and Eddyk!  As everyone else said...rain??? I wish!!!
Herb would have approved Beans, as you know he wasn't fussy about what he caught as long as he was fishing. Thank you!
